# Temperature, Distance, and Volume Converter [(by rondhi)](<https://www.twitch.tv/rondhi>)

```

```



| Command                                                           | Action                                                            | Usage                                                             | Explanation                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| !convert                                                            | !convert                                                        | `!convert # <c, f, mi, km, oz, ml>` | Converts temperature units (Celsius and Fahrenheit), distance units (miles and kilometers), and volume units (fluid ounces (US) and milliliters) |
